author: DJ Speciale
title: Tradimiento
text: -Por favor no enganche. estaba pensando en ti. Y en esta ùltima noche de amor y pasiòn... donde estàs?
-Donde estabas? You know where I was at, I was home while you were with your new boyfriend
-Yeah, it's a lie accept that i saw you when you got in the car with him
-Que me viste? Oye amòr mìo perdoname. No lo quise a ser, perdoname
-No no no no baby, they say no baseball game, you only get one chance and you blood
